quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.title: Request a quote bottom message
quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.description: Enter an informative message that displays when a quote is requested.
quote.requestAQuoteWizardBottomMessage.default: Once your quote has been submitted, a sales representative will contact you in XX business days. For immediate assistance call us at (000)-XXX-XXXX or email us at xxxx@xxxx.com

quote.contactBusinessDaysMessage.title: Request a quote Business Days
quote.contactBusinessDaysMessage.description: Enter the sales representative contact expectation message. Example: "A sales representative will contact you within two business days."
quote.contactBusinessDaysMessage.default: A sales representative will contact you in XX business days.
